text: Into the Night is a 1985 American black comedy thriller movie directed John Landis and stars Jeff Goldblum, Michelle Pfeiffer, Dan Aykroyd, David Bowie, Bruce McGill, Richard Farnsworth, Irene Papps, Clu Gulager, Kathryn Harrold. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1985 comedy movies Category:1985 thriller movies Category:1980s black comedy movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies directed by John Landis Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Into the Night
